snippet: José Manuel Barroso’s support for a single telecommunications market seizes on a popular idea at a time of doubt over enhancing the European Union’s powers.
abstract: Jose Manuel Barroso, European Commission president, calls for end to high fees charged for making mobile phone calls across national borders, seizing on one of few truly popular European initiatives at time of rising skepticism about European Union; plan for phasing out roaming fees is part of wider overhaul of telecommunications industry.
lead_paragraph: José Manuel Barroso’s support for a single telecommunications market seizes on a popular idea at a time of doubt over enhancing the European Union’s powers.

headline.main: European Chief Backs Plan to End Roaming Fees
headline.print_headline: European Chief Backs Plan to End Roaming Fees
